attributes.action: Fund cancer drugs by scrapping the proposed ID card scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Money spent on the governments ID cards scheme could be better utilised by being spent on the newer more expensive cancer drugs coming out.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/IDcardOnlineVote/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
